definition: to deal with something unpleasant head on
details:
verb
- to deal with something unpleasant head on
= example: to deal with something unpleasant head on
= synonyms: face
- to present somebody with something, usually to accuse or criticize
= example: to present somebody with something, usually to accuse or criticize
= synonyms: present
- to oppose, as in hostility or a competition
= example: to oppose, as in hostility or a competition
= synonyms: face
- to be face to face with
= example: to be face to face with
